Meaning: intended to arouse strong emotion, interest, or reaction
to regard with disgust and hatred; to loathe
done consciously and intentionally; careful and unhurried
large or heavy and therefore difficult to carry or use; unwieldy
gradually diminishing in size, strength, or number
comprehensive in terms of information or learning; wide-ranging
self-satisfied and unaware of possible dangers or deficiencies
interchangeable; replaceable by another identical item
showing or characterized by simplicity and lack of luxury or comfort
